concept.title: HTTP Protocols
concept.shortdesc: You can configure Data Collector to use HTTP or HTTPS when you run cluster pipelines. By default Data Collector uses HTTP.

conbody.p: To configure HTTPS when you run cluster pipelines, you must generate an SSL/TLS certificate for the gateway node and the worker nodes. You then specify the generated keystore file and keystore password file for the gateway and worker nodes in the configuration file, sdc.properties. You can optionally generate a truststore file for the gateway and worker nodes.
